cells.data:
Add a host config 
```sh
mc config host add {{hostname}} {{host-ip:host-port}} {{accessKey}} {{secretKey}} 
```

List all contents of a bucket
```sh
 mc ls {{host-name}}/{{bucket-name}}
 ```
 
List all contents of a folder under a bucket
```sh
mc ls {{host-name}}/{{bucket-name}}/{{folder}}
 ```
 
 Delete a folder under a bucket
 ```sh
 mc rm --force {{host-name}}/{{bucket-name}}/{{folder}}
 ```
 
Set Anonymous Policy for a folder

```sh
mc policy download {{host-name}}/{{bucket-name}}/{{folder}}
```

Set Anonymous Policy for a bucket

```sh
mc policy download {{host-name}}/{{bucket-name}}
```

Find the current policy of the bucket
```sh
mc policy {{host-name}}/{{bucket-name}}
```
